required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Survey of Regional Anesthesia Practice in Poland
clinical_study.official_title: Survey of Regional Anesthesia Practice in Poland - National Survey 2018

collaborator.agency: Department of Anesthesiology and Intensive Care, Czerniakowski Hospital, Warsaw
Polskie Towarzystwo Znieczulenia Regionalnego i Leczenia Bólu (Polish ESRA)
Sekcja Znieczulenia Regionalnego i Terapii Bólu, Polskie Towarzystwo Anestezjologii i Intensywnej Terapii (PTAiIT)

brief_summary.textblock: The study is being conducted to gain insight into regional anesthesia practice in polish hospitals specifically asking for methods used, accessibility to equipment and preference for regional blockade and perioperative analgesia.

detailed_description.textblock:
In recent years, regional anesthesia has become one of the most dynamic parts of anesthesiology. This is in part due to less invasive surgical procedures, surgical enhanced recovery protocols as well as the incorporation of ultrasonography into the daily practice of regional anesthesia.
The aim of this retrospective survey is to track and analyse the changes in everyday practice of regional anesthesia in Poland that have occurred in the year 2018.
An invitation to the survey will be sent to all heads of anesthesiology departments in Poland. The answers to the survey will be collected using an internet based website created by the authors of the study.

primary_outcome.time_frame: Up to 12 months practice in the year 2018
primary_outcome.description: Answers of head of anesthesiology and intensive care departments regarding regional anesthesia practice in their respective department by completing the Regional Anesthesia Survey 2018: multiple and single choice answers

primary_outcome.time_frame: Up to 12 months in the year 2018
primary_outcome.description: Answers of head of anesthesiology and intensive care departments regarding number of anesthesiologists practicing regional anesthesia

arm_group.description: Hospitals with anesthesia or intensive care practices

intervention.description: An invitation letter sent to Head of Anesthesiology and Intensive Care Department of Polish Hospital

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- All Polish hospitals practising anesthesiology and intensive care in the national register of medical practices (www.rpwdl.csioz.gov.pl)
Exclusion Criteria:
- Hospitals and medical practices not practising anesthesiology or intensive care

facility.name: I Department of Anesthesiology and Intensive Care Warsaw Medical University

patient_data.ipd_description: Results will be published only as collective data
